tool_description:
Truly cross platform, highly scalable gaming backend as service and real-time marketing platform that powers engagement and monetization.

Gamify your apps with Scoreoid's gaming backend as a service. 

Increase retention, engagement and sales in real-time using Scoreoid Live.  Scoreoid Live enables brands, studios, publishers and app developers to interact and engage with their users in
real-time.
name: Scoreoid
title: Scoreoid

api_list.name: getGameData()
api_list.description: sets the value for the key.

api_list.name: getGameField()
api_list.description: method lets you pull a specific field from your game info.

required_parameters.name: field
required_parameters.description: String Value, (name, short_description, description, game_type, version, levels,  platform, play_url, website_url, created, updated, player_count, scores_count, status) [Required]

api_list.name: createPlayer()
api_list.description: createPlayer() method lets you create a new player.

required_parameters.name: current_unlocked_items
required_parameters.description: The players current unlocked items [String, comma-separated]

optional_parameters.name: password
optional_parameters.description: The players password used if you would like to create user log-in

optional_parameters.name: difficulty
optional_parameters.description: Integer Value (don't use 0 as it's the default value)

optional_parameters.name: best_score
optional_parameters.description: The players best score calculated by Scoreoid [Integer]

optional_parameters.name: platform
optional_parameters.description: The players platform needs to match the string value that was used when creating the player

api_list.name: getGameAverage()
api_list.description: method lets you pull the average value for the game field’s.

required_parameters.name: field
required_parameters.description: String Value, (bonus, gold, money, kills, lives, time_played, unlocked_levels) [Required]

optional_parameters.name: platform
optional_parameters.description: The players platform needs to match the string value that was used when creating the player  [Optional]

api_list.name: countPlayers()
api_list.description: countPlayers() method lets you count all your players.

required_parameters.name: platform
required_parameters.description: The players platform needs to match the string value that was used when creating the player

required_parameters.name: difficulty
required_parameters.description: Integer Value (don't use 0 as it's the default value)

api_list.name: getGame()
api_list.description: method lets you pull all your game information.

api_list.name: countBestScores()
api_list.description: countBestScores() method lets you count all your game best scores.

required_parameters.name: platform
required_parameters.description: The players platform needs to match the string value that was used when creating the player

required_parameters.name: difficulty
required_parameters.description: Integer Value, (don't use 0 as it's the default value)

api_list.name: unsetGameData()
api_list.description: sets the value for the key.

api_list.name: setGameData()
api_list.description: sets the value for the key.

api_list.name: editPlayer()
api_list.description: editPlayer() method lets you edit your player information.

optional_parameters.name: best_score

optional_parameters.description: The players current unlocked items [String, comma-separated]

optional_parameters.name: platform
optional_parameters.description: The players platform needs to match the string value that was used when creating the player

api_list.name: getPlayers()
api_list.description: method lets you pull all the players for a game.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: Number Value, the limit, "20" retrieves rows 1 - 20 | "10,20" retrieves 20 scores starting from the 10th [Optional]

optional_parameters.name: platform
optional_parameters.description: String Value, needs to match the string value that was used when creating the player [Optional]

api_list.name: getPlayerData()

api_list.name: updatePlayerField()
api_list.description: updatePlayerField() method lets you update your player field’s.

required_parameters.name: field
required_parameters.description: String Value, (password, unique_id, first_name, last_name, email, best_score, bonus, achievements, gold, money,  kills, lives, time_played, unlocked_levels, unlocked_items, inventory, last_level, current_level, current_time, current_bonus,  current_kills, current_achievements, current_gold, current_unlocked_levels, current_unlocked_items, current_lifes, xp, energy,  boost, latitude, longitude, game_state, platform) [Required]

api_list.name: getPlayer()
api_list.description: getPlayer() checks if player exists and returns the player information. Post parameters work as query conditions. This method can be used for login by adding username and password parameters.

api_list.name: getPlayerScores()
api_list.description: getPlayerScores() method lets you pull all the scores for a player.

optional_parameters.name: difficulty
optional_parameters.description: Integer Value (don't use 0 as it's the default value)

optional_parameters.name: platform
optional_parameters.description: The players platform needs to match the string value that was used when creating the player

api_list.name: createScore()
api_list.description: createScore() method lets you create a score for a player.

required_parameters.name: username
required_parameters.description: String Value, if user does not exist it well be created

required_parameters.name: difficulty
required_parameters.description: Integer Value (don't use 0 as it's the default value)

api_list.name: incrementScore()
api_list.description: incrementScore() sets the value for the key.

required_parameters.name: username

api_list.name: deletePlayer()

api_list.name: getPlayerField()
api_list.description: getPlayerField() method lets you pull a specific field from your player info.

required_parameters.name: field
required_parameters.description: String Value, the selected field (username, password, unique_id, first_name, last_name, email, platform, created, updated, bonus, achievements, best_score, gold, money, kills, lives, time_played, unlocked_levels, unlocked_items, inventory, last_level, current_level, current_time, current_bonus, current_kills, current_achievements, current_gold, current_unlocked_levels, current_unlocked_items, current_lifes, xp, energy, boost, latitude, longitude, game_state, platform, rank) [Required]
